channel.title: Tidycensus on Sean Connelly

item.title: Voters' Windshield Perspective
item.description: Happy Fourth of July! Given the holiday, I thought it would be fitting to look at the intersection of politics and transportation. Last week, Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, a 28-year-old democratic socialist, defeated Joe Crowley, the incumbent who was tapped as the next Democratic House Speaker, in the New York 14th Congressional District (NY-14) primary. Ocasio-Cortezâ€™s victory made national news, which is no surprise given the natural story lines (grassroots versus establishment, etc.
